definition: to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]
a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

sentences.english: First, could you indent the first line of each paragraph?
sentences.chinese: 首先，你能不能把每段的第一行縮排？

sentences.english: When this option is selected, new lines are automatically indented.
sentences.chinese: 選取這個選項時，新行會自動縮排。

sentences.english: When this option is selected, new lines are not indented.
sentences.chinese: 選取這個選項時，新行不會縮排。

sentences.english: When selected, new lines are not indented.
sentences.chinese: 如果選取這個選項，新行不會縮排。

sentences.english: Indent the first line of a paragraph.
When selected, new lines are automatically indented.
sentences.chinese: 如果選取這個選項，新行會自動縮排。
